resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103761</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103761</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204398</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Zoo integrated unit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zoo integrierte Maßeinheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unité intégrée par zoo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade integrada jardim zoológico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità integrata giardino zoologico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενσωματωμένη ζωολογικός κήπος μονάδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Unidad integrada parque zoológico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The unit uses the North Carolina Zoological Park as a teaching tool rather than as a nice place to visit. It can be used by a single teacher or multiple teachers of different subjects, and it is aimed at 7th and 8th graders.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Maßeinheit benutzt den Nord-Carolina 
zoologischen Park als unterrichtendes Hilfsmittel anstatt als netter 
Platz, um zu besuchen. Sie kann von einem einzelnen Lehrer oder 
von mehreren Lehrern der unterschiedlichen Themen verwendet werden, 
und es ist angestrebte 7. und 8. Sortierer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'unité emploie le parc zoologique du nord de
la Caroline comme outil d'enseignement plutôt que comme endroit 
agréable pour visiter. Elle peut être employée par un 
professeur simple ou des professeurs multiples de différents sujets, 
et c'est les 7èmes et 8èmes niveleuses visées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A unidade usa o parque zoological de 
North.carolina como uma ferramenta ensinando melhor que como um lugar 
agradável visitar. Pode ser usada por um único professor ou 
por uns professores múltiplos de assuntos diferentes, e é 7os e 8os 
graduadores visados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'unità usa il parco zoologico del North.carolina
come strumento d'istruzione piuttosto che come posto piacevole per 
visitare. Può essere usata da un singolo insegnante o dagli 
insegnanti multipli degli oggetti differenti ed è settimo ed ottavi 
selezionatori puntati su.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μονάδα χρησιμοποιεί το ζωολογικό πάρκο της βόρειας 
Καρολίνας ως εργαλείο διδασκαλίας παρά ως συμπαθητική θέση που 
επισκέπτεται. Μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί από έναν ενιαίο 
δάσκαλο ή πολλαπλάσιους δασκάλους των διαφορετικών θεμάτων, και 
τον στοχεύουν στα 7α και 8α γκρέιντερ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La unidad utiliza el parque zoológico de Carolina
del Norte como herramienta de enseñanza más bien que como lugar 
agradable para visitar. Puede ser utilizada por un solo profesor
o profesores múltiples de diversos temas, y es 7mos y 8vos 
graduadores dirigidos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CRAIG SMITH
FN:CRAIG SMITH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204398</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103761</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>

        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/zoo-integrated-unit</uri>
